title: MGTnote
subTitle: My good time-我的好时光！
script: <script src='../assets/ArticleTOC.js'></script><script src='../assets/lightbox.js'></script><script src='../assets/copy.js'></script><script src='../assets/static/assets/clipboard.min.js'></script><script>document.querySelectorAll('a').forEach(anchor => {const img = anchor.querySelector('img');if (img && img.hasAttribute('data-canonical-src')) {const canonicalSrc = img.getAttribute('data-canonical-src');anchor.setAttribute('href', canonicalSrc);img.setAttribute('src', canonicalSrc);img.removeAttribute('data-canonical-src');}});</script>
